channel.title: [HYP] Dropping+Equiping Items
channel.description: Hey guys, I've just recently started up a Hyperion server, I'm using Eclipse and I'm very rusty with programming, for some reason I can't equip or drop items and I was wondering if anyone could help me out with this please?

item.title: [HYP] Dropping+Equiping Items
item.dc:creator: @bananaman bananaman
item.description:

For item dropping and picking up, I’m pretty sure that’s what your looking for.[/quote]

The download link for the classes is broken, thanks anyway
